name: Arrow of Love

30.name: Heart to Heart
30.description: Grants all angels an additional shield by 100% of Cupid's Max ATK.

60.name: Cupid Arrows
60.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%, and Crit is guaranteed if enemies in any debuff situation.

90.name: Twilight
90.description: Speed+100, Crit DMG+20% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

introduction: On this romantic night, send the blessings of love to your dear. Cupid is using arrows to weave a loving line that belongs only to this couple.
